thread.title: Samsung Z3 Coming to India on October 21 for $130
thread.title_full: Samsung Z3 Coming to India on October 21 for $130 - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Samsung Z3 Coming to India on October 21 for $130
text: Great news for those waiting for Samsung's new Tizen-powered smartphone, the Z3, as the company confirmed the device would go on sale in just a few days. According to Samsung India, the Z3 will be available for purchase in the country for just Rs 8,490 outright, which is about $130 or €115. A dedicated website for Samsung Z3 is already available so customers will be able to purchase it ... »
